about.title: About Us
about.intro: I'm so glad our paths have crossed and you're here.
about.experience: I'm Berk Capar. I have 8 years of product management experience in marketing technologies. Trust me, I've been everywhere in marketing. From creative agencies that led me to win awards for Nestle and Unilever, to AdTech companies focused on increasing website advertisement opportunities through different advertising products, and leading advertising teams for Samsung and Stack Overflow with daily traffic of 1 million, I certainly got my hands dirty a lot.
about.marketing_change: But I believe marketing is changing more now than ever before. AI is used to help big companies who have a lot of money to invest. But the latest developments in the generative AI space, with tools like ChatGPT and now AI agents, are creating huge opportunities for any business, opportunities that most of us are not very aware of. And I'm here to bridge this gap.
about.problem_solution: Imagine you want to create images and videos for your product, post them on social media regularly, and want to track results. Only creating one engaging social media graphic can require a collaboration between a copywriter and designer, taking an average of 3-5 hours and costing up to €200. Isn't it insane? The value of one post is €200, and that's why small and medium businesses can't build their social media presence regularly. But automations and AI can change that, and this is what my services are solving. I can set up different marketing automations for creating social media content backed by SEO, scheduling it, and analyzing the results for thousands of pieces of content/operations for much cheaper than this. That's the beauty of automations and AI: automating boring stuff. And you can save a huge amount of money and time that you can allocate to building and growing your business.
about.customization: Yes, it's that easy. And the best part is before we start I'm sitting down with you, understanding your pain points, and customizing those automations based on your needs. So, you'll get the best marketing tools for your business instead of the generic automations that most other tools offer. Imagine that you're hiring a bunch of AI automations instead of real people, automations that can work 7/24 and cost 100x less.
about.invitation: Too good to be true? Well, let us prove it!
about.closing: I'm looking forward to getting to know you better.
about.name: Berk Capar
